item.title: Guangxi Yulin weighs more than 100 kg "net red" dog, usually in addition to sleeping is to eat!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 2020-11-28 11:52:03 Source: xiaogu lookday Report A mention of Guangxi Yulin, you will think of what, will not think of “winter solstice fish raw summer solstice dog”, “Yulin Lychee Dog Meat Festival” and so on. In fact, not everyone imagine that way, the dog meat festival just before the process down, so there has always been this festival, this festival, not what dogs are killed. Today (November 28), the editor to take a look at the county of Yulin, Guangxi Rong County, a net red dog, it lives for more than a decade, weighing more than 100 pounds, usually in addition to sleep is to eat, very prosperous.
